title: New: Jacq Becker – Till I Think About You
body:
Can’t fault an absolutely huge chorus like this one from California’s **Jacq Becker** on her first original track, _Till I Think About You_.

Getting some serious Jessie Ware and even Ellie Goulding vibes from the songwriting, and the super slick production. This is an essential summer song. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
